main event: A civilian observed a large, cigar-shaped object glowing whitish-orange in Mooresville, Indiana, in June 1954.
interesting points: The object was sighted visually and lasted for about 10 minutes., The object appeared to be 500-600 feet in altitude., The observer reported that the object made no sound., The sighting occurred at 2220 hours on June 8, 1954., A photographer was involved in the case and noted it was to be evaluated by Dr. Hynek.
sighted object: one large cigar-shaped object glowing whitish-orange
